description: W PYTE EDYTOR NIE WIEM JAK GO UZYWAC

I'm starting to love Visual Studio Code nowadays but I still go back to Emacs regularly; once you have the editing keystrokes under your fingers then the mouse just becomes an irritant lol! I know that other editors provide emulation of Emacs keybindings but still, 'there can be only one!'
summary: 45 years old and still the best!

description: It is my editor, ide, desktop, terminal and everything.
summary: GNU Emacs is where I spend most of my time

description: Es un mundo en sí. Totalmente personalizable a mi gusto y necesidades.
